description: From be- +‎ shroud. Compare Old English bescrȳdan (“to clothe, cover with a shroud”).

verbs.description: beshroud (third-person singular simple present beshrouds, present participle beshrouding, simple past and past participle beshrouded)

entries.meaning: (transitive) To cover with or as with a shroud.
(transitive, figuratively) To hide in darkness, as with a cloak.
